archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Janus
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: JANUS is the next generation CenturyLink portal used by Business and Wholesale clients. It provides complete management control over a broad range of CenturyLink services, including nationwide ATM, Business Dial, Internet Port , Dedicated Hosting, nationwide Frame Relay, Managed Firewall VPN, Private Routed Network VPN, and Toll Free. JANUS allows customers to access through a Service Hub page a wide variety of network management, billing and reporting tools via a secure web site. JANUS is in the process of being replaced with Functional Microapps. https://www.lumen.com/login
